title: Your Keurig® Brewer Can Do More. Brew Over Ice.
description: Chilling out has never been this easy. Now you can enjoy a perfectly brewed iced coffee, iced tea, lemonade, or fruit brew at home, anytime you want! Just choose a specially crafted Brew Over Ice K-Cup® pack, brew over a full cup of ice, and enjoy! It's icy refreshment at the touch of a button.

asset.author: Keurig Inc
asset.hookText: Chilling out has never been this easy. Now you can enjoy a perfectly brewed iced coffee, iced tea, lemonade, or fruit brew at home, anytime you want! Just choose a specially crafted Brew Over Ice K-Cup® pack, brew over a full cup of ice, and enjoy! It's icy refreshment at the touch of a button.

transcripts: Do you love your Keurig brewer. Try specially crafted K-cup packs to brew over ice. Grab a 16 ounce cup and fill it with ice Choose the brew over ice K-cup pack that fits your mood and place in your Keurig brew. Select the setting for just the right taste. Sit back, relax and let your brewer do the work. Stir it up and enjoy icy cold flavors and refreshment all day long. Now available online, in groceries and at retailers nationwide. Brew over ice with your Keurig brewer.
